title: Error when spawing a revolute joint with bullet

content.raw:
In Gazebo from default branch (but the same issue is present also in Gazebo 4.0 I guess) a bunch of error are printed when spawning a model with revolute joints with bullet. 


To reproduce, launch gazebo with bullet:
~~~
gazebo -e bullet --verbose
~~~


And try to load the "Double pendulum with base" model, you will get this errors: 
~~~
[Err] [BulletHingeJoint.cc:345] Joint must be created before getting low stop
[Err] [BulletHingeJoint.cc:333] Joint must be created before getting high stop
[Err] [BulletHingeJoint.cc:345] Joint must be created before getting low stop
[Err] [BulletHingeJoint.cc:333] Joint must be created before getting high stop
[Err] [BulletHingeJoint.cc:299] bulletHinge not yet created.
[Err] [BulletHingeJoint.cc:320] bulletHinge not yet created.
[Err] [BulletHingeJoint.cc:299] bulletHinge not yet created.
[Err] [BulletHingeJoint.cc:299] bulletHinge not yet created.
[Err] [BulletHingeJoint.cc:320] bulletHinge not yet created.
[Err] [BulletHingeJoint.cc:299] bulletHinge not yet created.
~~~


Regarding the error in lines 299 and 320 it appears that the `bulletHinge` object is not valid when the `Joint::Init()` method is called. I don't know if this issue actually causes problems later, but I am investigating some problems [1] [2] that we are experiencing with bullet hinge joints, and perhaps it is related to them. 

[1] : https://github.com/robotology/gazebo-yarp-plugins/issues/127

[2] : https://github.com/robotology/gazebo-yarp-plugins/issues/128
content.html:
In Gazebo from default branch (but the same issue is present also in Gazebo 4.0 I guess) a bunch of error are printed when spawning a model with revolute joints with bullet.

To reproduce, launch gazebo with bullet:

gazebo -e bullet --verbose

And try to load the "Double pendulum with base" model, you will get this errors: 

[Err] [BulletHingeJoint.cc:345] Joint must be created before getting low stop
[Err] [BulletHingeJoint.cc:333] Joint must be created before getting high stop
[Err] [BulletHingeJoint.cc:345] Joint must be created before getting low stop
[Err] [BulletHingeJoint.cc:333] Joint must be created before getting high stop
[Err] [BulletHingeJoint.cc:299] bulletHinge not yet created.
[Err] [BulletHingeJoint.cc:320] bulletHinge not yet created.
[Err] [BulletHingeJoint.cc:299] bulletHinge not yet created.
[Err] [BulletHingeJoint.cc:299] bulletHinge not yet created.
[Err] [BulletHingeJoint.cc:320] bulletHinge not yet created.
[Err] [BulletHingeJoint.cc:299] bulletHinge not yet created.

Regarding the error in lines 299 and 320 it appears that the bulletHinge object is not valid when the Joint::Init() method is called. I don't know if this issue actually causes problems later, but I am investigating some problems [1] [2] that we are experiencing with bullet hinge joints, and perhaps it is related to them.

[1] : https://github.com/robotology/gazebo-yarp-plugins/issues/127

[2] : https://github.com/robotology/gazebo-yarp-plugins/issues/128
